roleset.name: cause to be closely affiliated, performance of a marriage (includes metaphorical usages)

example.name: not matrimony
example.text: Program trading money managers have gained control over a big chunk of the invested funds in this country , and the pressures on such money managers to produce consistent profits has wedded them to the ability to move rapidly in and out the market that program trading gives them .

propbank.arg: the pressures on such money managers to produce consistent profits
to the ability to move rapidly in and out the market that program trading gives them

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: These are not the actions of a development agency we d to central planning and to the concentration of investment decisions in the hands of government , as Mr. Roberts alleges .

propbank.arg: to the concentration of investment decisions in the hands of government

example.name: both parties in arg1
example.text: They are all vying for the story of the millennium , which is , as if you did n't know , tomorrow 's wedding of singer Madonna and filmmaker Guy Ritchie .

propbank.arg: of singer Madonna and filmmaker Guy Ritchie

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Eros begged Zeus and Aphrodite for their consent to his wedding of Psyche .

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Because of the vividness and dramatic character of Hakuin 's religious experiences , and his wedding of the twin Buddhist virtues of wisdom and compassion ...

propbank.arg: of the twin Buddhist virtues of wisdom and compassion
